channel.title: Redash Integration with Google Analytics
channel.description: I've integrated with google analytics and added it as a data source but it seems to be no sql data and I can't be able to have a table from it to Redash or run SQL on it All I want is to have the same data that google analytics to be able to get more visualization than google analytics or at least all of google analytics visualizations on Redash Thanks in advance

item.title: Redash Integration with Google Analytics
item.dc:creator: poborin
item.description:
There is a pull request with the GA v4 support. I confirm that the query runner is working correctly. I recommend to make queries in https://ga-dev-tools.web.app/ga4/query-explorer/ and then paste them into Redash query builder.

Read full topic

item.title: Redash Integration with Google Analytics
item.dc:creator: Eslam
item.description:
Okay what about old versions ? how can I make this integration and get all of the data and preform sql quarries on it ?!

Read full topic

item.title: Redash Integration with Google Analytics
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Welcome to the forum! Redash doesn’t support the v4 GA API yet, see here:

Google Analytics Reporting API v4 Feature Requests
Are there any plans to support Google Analytics Reporting API v4? Currently it seems to be v3…

Read full topic

item.title: Redash Integration with Google Analytics
item.dc:creator: Eslam
item.description:
I’ve integrated with google analytics and added it as a data source but it seems to be no sql data and I can’t be able to have a table from it to Redash or run SQL on it
All I want is to have the same data that google analytics to be able to get more visualization than google analytics or at least all of google analytics visualizations on Redash
Thanks in advance

Read full topic
